column1: Eldalondë (Quenya elda "of the Eldar" + londë "land-locked haven") was a haven on the western shores of Númenor
column2: at the mouth of the River Nunduinë.  It was built in the middle of the coast of Númenors great western bight
column3: between the arms of the wide Bay of Eldanna
column4: in the region known as Nísimaldar
column5: where the Fragrant Trees grew in high numbers.
